scriptLines: join1 derive(aplaza_id = iif(     !isNull(aplaza_id) && aplaza_id != '',     aplaza_id,     role_group_aplaza_id )) ~> derivedColumn2

scripts.text:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW public.vw_aplaza_all AS
WITH base AS (
  SELECT
    v.event_id,
    CASE
      WHEN v.Message_txt IS NOT NULL
       AND NULLIF(btrim(v.Message_txt), '') ~ '^[+-]?[0-9]+$'
        THEN (NULLIF(btrim(v.Message_txt), ''))::bigint
      ELSE NULL
    END AS Message,
    v.user_identity,
    v.gim_function,
    COALESCE(
      v.gim_function_number, 
      CASE
        WHEN split_part(v.gim_function, '.', 1) ~ '^[0-9]+$'
          THEN split_part(v.gim_function, '.', 1)::int
        ELSE NULL
      END
    ) AS gim_function_number,
    v.week,
    v.jaar,
    v.my_aand,
    v.confirmation_at,
    COALESCE(NULLIF(r.aplaza_id, ''), r.role_group_aplaza_id) AS aplaza_id
  FROM (
    -- file_results: confirmation_at + 1 hours
    SELECT
      event_id::text                AS event_id,
      Message::text                 AS Message_txt,
      user_identity::text           AS user_identity,
      gim_function::text            AS gim_function,
      NULL::int                     AS gim_function_number, 
      week::int                     AS week,
      year::int                     AS jaar,
      my_aand::text                 AS my_aand,
      (confirmation_at + interval '1 hours')::timestamptz AS confirmation_at
    FROM statistics.file_results
    WHERE confirmation_at IS NOT NULL

    UNION ALL

    -- transactions: event_at -> confirmation_at + 1 hours
    SELECT
      event_id::text                AS event_id,
      NULL::text                    AS Message_txt,
      user_identity::text           AS user_identity,
      gim_function::text            AS gim_function,
      CASE
        WHEN split_part(gim_function, '.', 1) ~ '^[0-9]+$'
          THEN split_part(gim_function, '.', 1)::int
        ELSE NULL
      END                           AS gim_function_number,
      week::int                     AS week,
      year::int                     AS jaar,
      NULL::text                    AS my_aand,
      (event_at + interval '1 hours')::timestamptz AS confirmation_at
    FROM statistics.transactions
    WHERE event_at IS NOT NULL
  ) v
  LEFT JOIN usermgmt.v_get_aplaza_ids r
    ON lower(trim(v.user_identity)) = lower(trim(r.username))
)
SELECT
  b.*,
  (
    (regexp_split_to_array(b.gim_function, '\.'))[
      array_length(regexp_split_to_array(b.gim_function, '\.'), 1) - 1
    ]
    || '.' ||
    (regexp_split_to_array(b.gim_function, '\.'))[
      array_length(regexp_split_to_array(b.gim_function, '\.'), 1)
    ]
  ) AS functie_id,
  CASE 
    WHEN b.my_aand IN ('N741','H742') 
      THEN b.my_aand || '_' || b.user_identity
    ELSE NULL
  END AS my_aand_user
FROM base AS b
WHERE b.event_id IS NOT NULL
  AND (b.user_identity IS NULL OR b.user_identity NOT LIKE 'EZAPP%')
  AND NOT (b.event_id IN ('73','74') AND b.Message = 0)
  AND (
    b.event_id <> '45'
    OR (regexp_split_to_array(b.gim_function, '\.'))[3] = '300'
  );
SELECT EXTRACT(WEEK FROM (NOW() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC'))::int AS current_week;
